projects.long_desc: Long description of Spotify Search. Here I can search for artisty or albums which I like and I dont have to log in. Other things is that Im working on funcionality to be able to listen to te song.

desc.title: Fruity Board
desc.text: In this project I've used Vue.js for the first time. Inspiration came with love for colors, taste and beautiful symmetrical patterns of fruits. Main conception was to give opportunity to just share images where is at least one visible random fruit. Uploaded Pictures are filtered with help of the Google API, pictures without fruits are rejected. Uploading pictures you can add: title, author, tags and description.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: To navigate to different sites I'm using Hash-Routing, so selected picture can be send to someone with URL.
